IsEventDriven.description: Whether this object is active by default or must be triggered by something first.

Action.description: How this rigidbody behaves. Terrain means this rigidbody will act like, well, terrain, I.E. it will block player movement. Whereas ray-block will only block invisible player rays used to, for example, detect homing-attackable objects.

Extra.value: A cube-shaped rigidbody object, used for collision (I.E. invisible walls) or ray-blocking.
